  <script type="text/javascript">
   $("#client-sign-in-icon").click(function () {
        $("#client-sign-in").css("top", "75%");
        $("#client-sign-in").css("display", "block");
        return false;
    });

    $("#client-sign-in-Text").click(function () {
        $("#client-sign-in").css("display", "block");
        return false;
    });

    $("#client-sign-in-Mobile").click(function () {
        $("#client-sign-in").css("top", "25%");
        $("#client-sign-in").css("display", "block");
        return false;
    });

    $(window).scroll(function () {
        $("#client-sign-in").css("display", "none");
        $("#client-sign-in").css("top", "");
    });

    $("body").click(function () {
        $("#client-sign-in").css("display", "none");
        $("#client-sign-in").css("top", "");
    });

    $("#btnsearch").click(function () {
        var searchtxt = $("#btnsearchtext").val();
        if (searchtxt != '') {
            window.location.href = "/Components/Templates/SearchPage.aspx?addsearch=" + searchtxt;
        }
    });

    function handle(e) {
        if (e.keyCode === 13) {
            var searchtxt = $("#btnsearchtext").val();
            if (searchtxt != '') {
                window.location.href = "/Components/Templates/SearchPage.aspx?addsearch=" + searchtxt;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
  </script>
